title: You'll Always Be Enough
description: “By the light of the moon, each budding creature came to see that they’re not like one another, and that was meant to be. All have a purpose, and though it’s sometimes hard to know, they all have gifts that blossom as they grow. It won’t always be easy. At times, it will be tough, but no matter how you’re feeling, you’ll always be enough.”
author: Laura Kuehl
